alert.note: Alert for Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 1:40AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Northampton County through 215 AM EDT... At 140 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cape Charles, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cape Charles around 150 AM EDT. Cheriton and Bay View around 155 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Simpkins, Capeville, Townsend, Kiptopeke State Park, Oyster, Eastville, Kiptopeke, Cheapside, Plantation and Dalbys. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for eastern Virginia.
